summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3323, for the improvement of Hiawatha Place, from Charles Street to the south line of Block 8, Rainier Boulevard Addition to the City of Seattle and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41058 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
